name: 🚀 Safe Deploy
description: One-click safe deploy agent. Runs safeguard, auto-detects repo, executes proper deploy script, updates README, and pushes.
script:
#!/usr/bin/env bash
set -euo pipefail

# Import safeguard
source "$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel)/scripts/safeguard.sh"
safeguard_check

# Detect repo name from git folder
REPO_NAME=$(basename "$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel)")

# Decide which script to run
if [[ "$REPO_NAME" == "synqra-os" ]]; then
  echo "[safe-deploy] 🚀 Running Synqra deploy..."
  ./scripts/deploy_synqra.sh
else
  echo "[safe-deploy] 🚀 Running generic deploy for $REPO_NAME..."
  ./scripts/deploy_any_repo.sh "$REPO_NAME"
fi

# Auto-open URL if deploy script produced it
if [[ -f DEPLOY_URL.txt ]]; then
  url=$(cat DEPLOY_URL.txt)
  case "$OSTYPE" in
    linux*)    xdg-open "$url" >/dev/null 2>&1 & ;;
    darwin*)   open "$url" >/dev/null 2>&1 & ;;
    msys*|cygwin*|win32*) start "" "$url" >/dev/null 2>&1 ;;
    *) echo "[safe-deploy] 🌍 Please open manually: $url" ;;
  esac
fi
